  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_369</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_369</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Programación lineal</string>
            <string language="en">Linear programming</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lineare Programmierung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programmation linéaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Programação linear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmazione lineare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμικός προγραμματισμός</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de programación lineal. Se estudia el problema de optimización de una función lineal de dos variables sobre un recinto plano limitado por rectas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to introduce the concept of linear programming. It studies the problem of optimizing a linear function of two variables within a plane region bounded by straight lines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">mínimo</string>
            <string language="en">minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función objetivo</string>
            <string language="en">objective function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">optimización</string>
            <string language="en">optimization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">programación lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear programming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">máximo</string>
            <string language="en">maximum</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der linearen Programmierung vorzustellen. 
Es studiert das Problem der Optimierung einer linearen Funktion 
von zwei Variablen innerhalb einer flachen Region, die durch gerade 
Geraden gesprungen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de présenter le concept de la programmation linéaire. 
Il étudie le problème d'optimaliser une fonction linéaire de 
deux variables dans une région plate liée par les lignes droites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações introduzir
o conceito da programação linear. Estuda o problema de 
optimizing uma função linear de duas variáveis dentro de uma 
região plana limitada por linhas retas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
introdurre il concetto di programmazione lineare. Studia il 
problema di ottimizzazione della funzione lineare di due variabili 
all'interno di una regione piana limitata dalle linee rette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εισαγάγει την έννοια του γραμμικού προγραμματισμού. 
Μελετά το πρόβλημα μια γραμμική λειτουργία δύο μεταβλητών 
μέσα σε μια περιοχή αεροπλάνων οριακή από τις ευθείες γραμμές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Minimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zielfunktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
